attributes.action: Give Knighthood or peerage to SIMON COWELL
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Simon Cowell should be recognised for his huge influence on the entertainment industry & for promoting British talent both at home & abroad

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
